fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: GM Echo: In the day, you may tell the Host absolutely anything (within server rules) to then repeat exactly in the Day Chat. You may use this ability as many times as you wish.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: At least once in a game, convince players to vote to execute a player who wasn't even on Trial in the first place. (Such an event would not kill anyone.)
